labels.name: feature
labels.value: Add Termination reason and reporting method

name: AddReportingMethodAndTerminationReason

description: Check if PIM Menu > Configuration > Reporting method and termination options working.

steps.name: Login, navigate to PIM > configuration > custom fields > add the reporting method and termaintion reason and then delete
